title: Midsummer Sinners
description: She’s a rule-breaker.He’s the cop who’s going to tame her and enjoy every second.EverettSycamore mountain is a quiet place. I’ve done my time being a cop elsewhere, now, I like the slower pace of life. The worst thing about my job is keeping an eye on out-of-season hunting.Summer Evans is like a bolt of lightning into my calm, orderly existence.She’s a force of nature, a menace, a rule-breaking beauty who gets right under my skin.She plans to do some kind of ritual in the forest on Midsummer’s eve. It sounds harmless enough, but it could be dangerous alone, and I won’t allow anything to happen to Summer.Whether she likes it or not, she’s mine to protect……and to keep.The MAN OF THE MONTH CLUB is a steamy small-town collection featuring a new hottie (or two!) every month. In 2022, escape to Sycamore Mountain, North Carolina and celebrate ALL the holidays with your favorite group of romance authors and their delicious mountain men. Can’t wait to see you there!
author: Gia Bailey
